function_description: Show/hide boards in projects using the triangle button.
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and the sidebar is visible, with projects listed.
steps: Locate the triangle button next to the project name in the sidebar.
Click the triangle button to expand or collapse the list of boards within the project.
expected_state: The boards within the selected project are either shown or hidden, allowing the user to navigate through the projects more efficiently.
